textBeforeTable: Individual Leadership Skills (3 credits) Then (One course from approved list in each area below): First LEAD 2000/PYC 2620 - Exploring Leadership (3 credits) Requirements for the Leadership Minor If you find that leadership is your passion or you would like to compliment your Major, consider the Leadership Minor! If you have planned to work towards your Emerging Leaders' Medallion, you are just a few courses away from earning the Minor!
